channel.title: Item Spawns
channel.description:
Hi, I'm using a deltascape source. item spawns (::pickup #### ####, and ::item #### ####) used to be working. than all of a sudden an admin logged on and said it doesnt work. now no admins can item spawn.
any suggestions on what to do?

item.title: Item Spawns
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

Search for if (command.startsWith("pickup") and make sure it says

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { , or

	    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {

Read full topic

item.title: Item Spawns
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Thats helpful.

item.title: Item Spawns
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

download delta again, and copy the pickup and item code and replace yours with them.

Read full topic
